component.name: Google Antigravity
component.summary: An agentic development platform for the agent-first era

description.p: Google Antigravity is an AI-powered integrated development environment (IDE) that evolves the standard coding experience into an agent-first era. It features autonomous agents that can plan, code, and browse the web to assist in complex software engineering tasks.

ul.li: Autonomous AI agents for planning and implementation
Rich Artifacts for transparent agent communication
Full terminal and tool integration within a sandboxed environment
